1793250.effect: During the Main Phase: You can Ritual Summon 1 "Nekroz" Ritual Monster from your hand by Tributing monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of that monster. If your opponent controls a monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, you can also Tribute monsters they control. You can banish this card from your GY; Add 1 of your "Nekroz" Ritual Spells that is banished or in your GY to your hand. You can only use 1 effect of "Nekroz Transcendence" per turn, and only once that turn.
1793250.name: Nekroz Transcendence

1760958.effect: Cannot by Synchro Summoned. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by sending 2 monsters you control to the GY whose total difference in their Levels equals exactly 1 (1 Tuner and 1 non-Tuner). This card's name is also always treated as "Majestic Dragon". If this card is Special Summoned while you control a Level 8 Dragon Synchro Monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Majestic Token" (Dragon/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). If a "Majestic" Synchro Monster you control would be returned to the Extra Deck by it's own effect, you can return this card from the GY to the Extra Deck instead. You can only Special Summon "Heavenly Majestic Dragon" once per turn.
1760958.name: Heavenly Majestic Dragon

1903214.effect:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Yubel". This card's name is also treated as "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" while in the hand, field, or GY. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Yubel - Harbinger of Disaster" per turn, and only once that turn.
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other card you control; destroy 1 card in a different column than the target, then, destroy the target, also if it was a monster, this card gains ATK/DEF equal to half the ATK/DEF of that monster while on the field.
● If this card leaves the field by a card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel - The Final End" or "Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare" from your hand, Deck, or GY.
1903214.name: Yubel - Harbinger of Disaster

1903217.effect:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Yubel". This card's name is also treated as "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" while in the hand, field, or GY. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Yubel - Infernal Descendant" per turn, and only once that turn.
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other card you control; negate the effects of all other cards in that card's column, then, destroy the target, also if it was a monster, this card gains ATK/DEF equal to half the ATK/DEF of that monster while on the field.
● If this card leaves the field by a card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel - The Tortuous Symbiote" or "Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare" from your hand, Deck, or GY.
1903217.name: Yubel - Infernal Descendant

1903207.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Yubel - Harbinger of Disaster". Your opponent cannot target Level 11 or higher monsters on the field with cards effects. Once per turn, if a monster(s) is sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster on the field or in the GY; this card gains ATK/DEF equal to half the targets ATK/DEF. If this card leaves the field by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel " or "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Yubel - The Final End" once per turn.
1903207.name: Yubel - The Final End

1903210.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Yubel - Infernal Descendant". Level 11 or higher monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's cards effects. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can add 1 "Yubel" card from your Deck to your hand, also if it was a monster, this card gains ATK/DEF equal to its Level x200. If this card leaves the field by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel " or "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Yubel - The Torturous Symbiote" once per turn.
1903210.name: Yubel - The Torturous Symbiote

1903206.effect:
If your opponent takes battle or effect damage: You can have 1 "Yubel" monster you control gain ATK/DEF equal to the damage they took. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Yubel Projection" per turn, and only once that turn.
● Add 1 "Yubel" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Yubel Projection", then, destroy 1 other "Yubel" card from your hand or field. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck the turn you activate this effect.
● During the End Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel" from your hand or GY but its effects are negated this turn.
1903206.name: Yubel Projection

1903201.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● Add 1 "Yubel" monster from your Deck to your hand.
● Shuffle any number of Level 10 or higher monsters from your hand into the Deck, then draw the same number of cards.
● Special Summon 1 Level 10 or higher monster from your your hand in Defense Positon.
You can only activate 1 "Yubel's Descent" per turn.
1903201.name: Yubel's Descent

1903193.effect: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated, and you control a "Yubel" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck, then destroy 1 "Yubel" monster you control. You can only activate 1 "Yubel Consciousness Harvester" per turn.
1903193.name: Yubel Consciousness Harvester

1903196.effect:
Once per turn, if a card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effect, while you control only Fiend monsters, you can destroy 1 "Yubel" monster you control instead. You can only control 1 "Yubel Contagion". While you control a Fiend monster whose original ATK/DEF are 0, apply these effects during your opponent's turn, or if you control a Level 12 "Yubel" monster, apply them during both player's turn instead.
● All monsters your opponent controls are changed to Attack Position, also, all monsters your opponent controls must attack the monster(s) you control with the highest Level, if able.
● Fiend monster you control whose original ATK/DEF are 0 cannot be destroyed by battle.
● Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken.
1903196.name: Yubel Contagion

1903189.effect: Shuffle 1 "Yubel" monster from your hand, field, or GY into your Deck, then either add from your Deck to your hand or Special Summon from your hand ignoring its summoning conditions, 1 "Yubel" monster that must be Special Summoned by the shuffled monster. During the End Phase: You can destroy 1 card you control. You can only use 1 effect of "Yubel's Continuation" per turn, and only once that turn.
1903189.name: Yubel's Continuation

1903194.effect: If you control a Level 11 or higher "Yubel" monster that was Special Summoned by the effect of a "Yubel" monster: Discard 1 card then target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If you control a Level 12 "Yubel" monster, you do not need to discard to activate this effect. You can only use this effect of "Yubel's Vendetta" once per turn.
1903194.name: Yubel's Vendetta

1898393.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can reveal 1 Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 "Lyoko Token" (Cyberse/?/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. but it cannot be used as Link Material. (This Token's Attribute becomes the Attribute of the revealed Fusion Monster). You can banish this card from your GY; activate 1 "Scanner Room" from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Digitallias William Dunbar" once per turn.
1898393.name: Digitallias William Dunbar

1898256.effect: Once per turn: You can Normal Summon 1 "Digitallias" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Cyberse Union monster from your hand or Deck. You can only activate 1 "Scanner Room" per turn.
1898256.name: Scanner Room

1898633.effect: "Digitallias William Dunbar" + 1 LIGHT Cyberse monstersCannot be used as Fusion Material the turn it is Special Summoned. Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by sending the above cards you control to the GY. (You do not use "Polymerization".) If this card destroys a monster: You can destroy all monsters you opponent controls with DEF less than or equal to that destroyed monster's ATK. When your opponent activates a monsters effect (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect. You can only use each effect of "Digitallias William the Rookie" once per turn.
1898633.name: Digitallias William the Rookie

1898951.effect: "Digitallias William Dunbar" + 1 DARK Cyberse monstersCannot be used as Fusion Material the turn it is Special Summoned. Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by sending the above cards you control to the GY. (You do not use "Polymerization".) (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Attack Position monster; switch it to defense position, and if you do its effect is negated and its DEF becomes 0. You can only use this effect of "Xana-Digitallias William the Warrior" once per turn.
1898951.name: Xana-Digitallias William the Warrior

1713100.effect: 2+ WATER and/or FIRE monsters, including at least 2 monsters with different AttributesIf you would Link Summon this card while your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can also banish appropriate monsters from you GY as Link Material, up to the difference. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it, then if you discarded a monster of 1 of the following Attributes, apply the appropriate effect.● WATER: Make your opponent send 1 card from their hand to the GY.● FIRE: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's ATK or DEF (whichever is higher).
1713100.name: Allinav, The Heat Master

1713740.effect: 2+ WIND and/or EARTH monsters, including at least 2 monsters with different AttributesIf you would Link Summon this card while your opponent controls more cards than you do, you can also banish appropriate monsters from your GY as Link Material, up to the difference. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it, then if you discarded a monster of 1 of the following Attributes, apply the appropriate effect.● WIND: Place 1 card your opponent controls on the bottom of the Deck.● EARTH: Special Summon 1 monster from either player's GY, but it cannot attack directly.
1713740.name: Edurad, The Sandstorm

1869639.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Ashen" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Spirit, Descendant of the Blazing Fire" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1869639.name: Ashen Spirit, Descendant of the Blazing Fire
1869639.treated_as: Ashen Spirit, Descendant of the Blazing Fire

1877167.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster.If a "Ashen" monster is Synchro Summoned, while this card is in yoir GY: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field, then you can Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" to your opponents side of the field. You can only use this effect of "Ashen Wanderer, Descendant of the Blazing Fog" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1877167.name: Ashen Wanderer, Descendant of the Blazing Fog
1877167.treated_as: Ashen Wanderer, Descendant of the Blazing Fog

1885911.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can Banish 1 "Ashen" monster from your hand or GY: This cards Level either becomes the banished monsters, or this card gains Levels equal to the banished monster. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Collector, Descendant of the Blazing Spirits" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1885911.name: Ashen Collector, Descendant of the Blazing Spirits
1885911.treated_as: Ashen Collector, Descendant of the Blazing Spirits

1877068.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard 1 card: Excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck: Special Summon 1 excavated "Ashen" monster, but its effects are negated, then shuffle the other 4 excavated cards into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Archer, Descendant of the Blazing Bows" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1877068.name: Ashen Archer, Descendant of the Blazing Bows
1877068.treated_as: Ashen Archer, Descendant of the Blazing Bows

1885906.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Ashen" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Ashen Slicer, Descendant of the Blazing Swords" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1885906.name: Ashen Slicer, Descendant of the Blazing Swords
1885906.treated_as: Ashen Slicer, Descendant of the Blazing Swords

1869686.effect: If you control an "Ashen" monster, or your opponent controls a FIRE monster, you can reveal this card in your hand: Special Summon this card from your hand and, if possible, 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then you can make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Ashen" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Ghoul, Descendant of the Blazing Shadows" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, or its effects are activated, except FIRE monsters.
1869686.name: Ashen Ghoul, Descendant of the Blazing Shadows
1869686.treated_as: Ashen Ghoul, Descendant of the Blazing Shadows

1885956.effect: All "Ashen" monsters you control gain 300 ATK. If your opponent controls 4 or more FIRE monsters, you can look at your opponents Extra Deck and banish 1 monster in it. If an "Ashen" monster leaves your field because of your opponents card or effect, you can pay 1000 LP: Add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Devistation" once per turn.
1885956.name: Ashen Devistation

1879007.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Ashen" monster from your Deck to your hand. If your opponent Special Summons a monster, you can target that monster; it becomes treated as a FIRE Attribute monster. If an "Ashen" monster is Synchro Summoned, while your opponent controls a FIRE Normal monster, you can target 1 monster your opponent controls: It loses 500 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Temple of The Burning Descendants" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn this card is activated, except FIRE monsters.
1879007.name: Ashen Temple of The Burning Descendants
1879007.treated_as: Ashen Temple of The Burning Descendants

1885938.effect: Equip to a monster your opponent controls. It loses 500 ATK, it cannot activate its effects and its name becomes "Ashen Pawn". If the equipped monster is sent to the GY, the owner of this card can Special Summon 1 "Ashen" monster from their GY. You can only activate 1 "Assault of the Ashen Spirits" per turn.
1885938.name: Assault of the Ashen Spirits

1879056.effect:
1 "Ashen" Tuner monster + 1+non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned, you can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Ashen" monster in your GY: Special Summon it, buts its effects are negated. Once per Chain, during your opponent's Main Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using this card you control. A "Ashen" monster Synchro Summoned by this effect can activate 1 of its effects as a Quick Effect. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Goliath, Descendant of the Blazing Giants" once per turn.
1879056.name: Ashen Goliath, Descendant of the Blazing Giants
1879056.treated_as: Ashen Goliath, Descendant of the Blazing Giants

1877145.effect:
1 "Ashen" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
(Quick Effect) You can Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. This monster gains the following effects based on the number of FIRE Attribute monsters on the field:
●2: You can destroy 1 FIRE Normal Monster on the field, then target 1 monster on the field: Destroy it.
●4: The first time this card would be destroyed by card effect per turn, it is not.
●6: During the Battle Phase, if this card declares an attack on an opponents monster: You can banish that monster, and if you do, this card can make a second attack during the Battle Phase this turn, and if it does, it gains 100 ATK for each FIRE monster on the field.
You can only use each effect of "Ashen Phoenix, Descendant of the Blazing Inferno" once per turn.
1877145.name: Ashen Phoenix, Descendant of the Blazing Inferno
1877145.treated_as: Ashen Phoenix, Descendant of the Blazing Inferno

1862987.effect:
1 "Ashen" Tuner monster + 1+ non-Tuner monsters.
(Quick Effect) You can Special Summon 1 "Ashen Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) to your opponents side of the field, then make 1 monster your opponent controls be treated as a FIRE attribute monster. This monster gains the following effects based on the number of FIRE Attribute monsters on the field:
●2: You can target 1 card on the field: Banish it
●4: Cannot be targeted by card effects.
●6: FIRE monsters you control inflict double battle damage, and inflict piercing battle damage.
●8: You can send all other face-up cards on the field to the GY, and if you do, your opponent takes no battle damage for the rest of the turn.
You can only use each effect of "Ashen Dragon, Descendant of the Blazing Star" once per turn.
1862987.name: Ashen Dragon, Descendant of the Blazing Star
1862987.treated_as: Ashen Dragon, Descendant of the Blazing Star

1885922.effect:
2 "Ashen" monsters
If an "Ashen" monster is Synchro Summoned to a zone this card points to, and all monsters this card points to are FIRE Attribute, you can target 1 card on the field: Destroy it. If a FIRE Attribute monster is Special Summoned to your opponents side of the field to a zone this card points to; You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Ashen" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Ashen Paladin" Descendant of the Blazing Front Lines" once per turn.
1885922.name: Ashen Paladin, Descendant of the Blazing Front Lines
1885922.treated_as: Ashen Paladin, Descendant of the Blazing Front Lines

1879100.effect:
3+ "Ashen" monsters
Synchro monsters can be treated as 2 Link Materials for the Link Summon of this card. You can target as many monsters your opponent controls, up to the amount of monsters that this card points to, apply these effects in sequence:
●Banish those monsters
●Monsters your opponent controls that point to this card become treated as FIRE Attribute monsters.
● Special Summon 1 "Ashen" Synchro Monster from your GY to a zone this card points to, but until the end of the turn, its effects are negated, and it cannot attack, then take 1000 damage.
You can only use each effect of "Ashen Reaper, Descendant of the Blazing Scythe" once per turn.
1879100.name: Ashen Reaper, Descendant of the Blazing Scythe
1879100.treated_as: Ashen Reaper, Descendant of the Blazing Scythe

1501067.effect: Your opponent cannot target face-up "Frostyre" monsters you control for attacks, except "Frostyre Guard Hail". If this card is Normal Summoned, It gains 500 ATK/DEF. If you have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY, you can Tribute 1 "Frostyre" monster you control, then target up to 2 Spell/Trap cards your opponent controls; Destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Frostyre Guard Hail" once per turn.
1501067.name: Frostyre Guard Hail

1501013.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by paying 1000 LP, and while you have no Spells/Traps in your GY. If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Frostyre" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Frostyre King Leviathan", and if you do, reduce its Level by 1, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Frostyre" monsters.
1501013.name: Frostyre King Leviathan

1501075.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Frostyre" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Frostyre Paladin Cold" once per turn. If this card leaves the field, or is sent to the GY: Shuffle it into the Deck: Switch the original ATK and DEF of all "Frostyre" monsters you control. You must have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY to actiavte or resolve this cards' effects.
1501075.name: Frostyre Paladin Cold

1501032.effect: Cannot be destroyed by battle while in Attack Position. If you have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY, you can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Frostyre" monster from your Deck, but shuffle it into the Deck during the End Phase of your next turn. You can only use this effect of "Frostyre Queen Blizzaria" once per turn.
1501032.name: Frostyre Queen Blizzaria

1501218.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card using "Call of the Frostyrean Void". You can discard 1 card; Add 1 "Frostyre" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Arielle, The El Frostyre Invoker" once per turn.
1501218.name: Arielle, The El Frostyre Invoker

1501162.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card using "Call of the Frostyrean Void". "Frostyre" monsters you control can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If they do, apply their DEF for damage calculation. You can target any number of "Frostyre" cards in your GY; Shuffle them into the Deck, then add 1 "Frostyre" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Hel, The El Frostyre Executioner" once per turn.
1501162.name: Hel, The El Frostyre Executioner

1501201.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card using "Call of the Frostyrean Void". If this card is in your GY, and you have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY, you can shuffle this card into the Deck; send up to 2 "Frostyre" monsters with different names from your Deck to the GY. You must control a "Frostyre" Ritual Monster to activate and resolve this effect. You can Tribute 1 monster; Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Jormungandr, The El Frostyre Serpent" once per turn.
1501201.name: Jormungandr, The El Frostyre Serpent

1501375.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card using "Call of the Frostyrean Void". If this card is in your GY, and you have no Spell/Trap cards in your GY: You can shuffle this card into the Deck; destroy 1 card on the field. You must control a "Frostyre" Ritual Monster to activate and resolve this effect. You can Tribute this monster; Add 1 "Frostyre" Spell/Trap card from your Deck to your hand, also discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Snowflake, The El Frostyre Shadow" once per turn.
1501375.name: Snowflake, The El Frostyre Shadow

1503643.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Frostyre" Ritual Monster from your hand. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field, and/or shuffle "Frostyre" monsters from your GY into the Deck, whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon +1. If a "Frostyre" Ritual Monster you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can shuffle this card from your GY into the Deck, and any number of "Frostyre" cards from your GY, instead. You can only use this effect of "Call of the Frostyrean Void" once per turn.
1503643.name: Call of the Frostyrean Void

1503209.effect:
All "Frostyre" monsters gain 500 DEF. Once per turn, you can activate 1 of these effects:
● Pay 1000 Life Points; add 1 "Frostyre" monster from your Deck to your hand, except a Ritual Monster.
● You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; send 1 "Frostyre" monster from your Deck to the GY.
When a "Frostyre" card(s) is shuffled from your GY into your Deck, you can add it to your hand instead. If you control "Frostyre King Leviathan" when this effect was activated, you can Special Summon it instead. You can only activate 1 "Frostyre Castle" effect per turn.
1503209.name: Frostyre Castle

1503222.effect:
(This card's name is always treated as "Call of the Frostyrean Void").
This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Frostyre" Ritual Monster from your Deck. You must also shuffle monsters from your field, and/or shuffle any number of "Frostyre" monsters from your GY into the Deck, whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon +1. The Ritual Summoned monster is destroyed during the End Phase. You can shuffle this card frfom your GY into the Deck; both players draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Frostyrean Respiteful Call" effect per turn.
1503222.name: Frostyrean Respiteful Call

1505181.effect: Every time a monster is shuffled into the Deck, all monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK. You can send this card to they GY: All monsters you control gain 1000 DEF. If this card is in your GY, you can shuffle it into the Deck, and any number of "Frostyre" cards. You can only activate 1 "Frostyre Ascendancy" effect per turn.
1505181.name: Frostyre Ascendancy

1505194.effect: When your opponent declares an attack, you can activate this card: Shuffle 2 cards from your GY into the Deck; End the Battle Phase. If you shuffled "Frostyre" cards with this effect, it becomes the End Phase instead, also skip your Draw Phase. If this card is in your GY, you can shuffle it into the Deck, and any number of "Frostyre" cards in your GY into the Deck. You can only use 1 "Frostyre Wave" effect per turn.
1505194.name: Frostyre Wave

1503615.effect: During the Battle Phase, if a Level 4 or lower "Frostyre" monster battles a monster your opponent controls with higher ATK: Shuffle 1 card from your field or GY into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher "Frostyre" monster from your Deck. If you have no Spell/Traps cards in your GY at this cards' activation, monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle this turn. If this card is in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, and any number of "Frostyre" cards in your GY into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "Frostyrean Distress Signal" effect per turn.
1503615.name: Frostyrean Distress Signal

1889168.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If you control no face-up monsters or you only control face-up "Darkest Forest" monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Creature from the Darkest Forest" once per turn. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889168.name: The Creature from the Darkest Forest
1889168.treated_as: The Creature from the Darkest Forest

1889155.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If you control no face-up monsters or you only control face-up "Darkest Forest" monsters, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Fox from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889155.name: The Fox from the Darkest Forest
1889155.treated_as: The Fox from the Darkest Forest

1889140.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If you control a face-up Yokai monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you control 2 or more face-up Yokai monsters including at least 1 "Darkest Forest" monster, you can Special Summon this card from your GY instead, then banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Hound from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889140.name: The Hound from the Darkest Forest
1889140.treated_as: The Hound from the Darkest Forest

1889216.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Darkest Forest" card: You can add 1 "Darkest Forest" card from your GY or that is banished to your hand. You can only use this effect of "The Moose from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889216.name: The Moose from the Darkest Forest
1889216.treated_as: The Moose from the Darkest Forest

1889213.name: The Pegasus from the Darkest Forest

1889082.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Darkest Forest" monster from your hand, or, if you control another face-up Yokai monster, you can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Darkest Forest" from your Deck instead. You can only use this effect of "The Raven from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889082.name: The Raven from the Darkest Forest
1889082.treated_as: The Raven from the Darkest Forest

1889110.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Darkest Forest" monster that its banished or in your GY, or, if you control another face-up Yokai monster, you can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Darkest Forest" from your hand instead, then banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Reaper" from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material of a Yokai Synchro Monster, you can banish this card instead.
1889110.name: The Reaper from the Darkest Forest

1889125.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If you control a face-up Yokai monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand, or, if you control 2 or more face-up Yokai monsters including at least 1 "Darkest Forest" monster, you can Special Summon this card from your GY instead, then banish the top card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Sheep from the Darkest Forest" once per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters. 1889125.treated_as: The Sheep from the Darkest Forest

1890205.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "Darkest Forest" monster from your Deck to your hand. While this card is face-up on the field, "Darkest Forest" monsters you control cannot be targeted by card effects, except Yokai monster's effects. If a Yokai monster is banished by its own effect: You can Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "The Darkest Forest" once per turn.
1890205.name: The Darkest Forest

1890223.effect: 1 Yokai Tuner monster + 1+ "Darkest Forest" non-Tuner Synchro monsters(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)You can shuffle up to 4 banished "Darkest Forest" cards back into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Darkest Forest" monsters from your hand or that its banished, but make its ATK 0, and also negate its effects or destroy up to 2 cards on the field. If this card is sent to GY: You can banish it instead. If this card is banished: You can shuffle all of your banished "Darkest Forest" cards, and if you do, Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "The Golden Ram from the Darkest Forest" once per turn.
1890223.name: The Golden Ram from the Darkest Forest
1890223.treated_as: The Golden Ram from the Darkest Forest

1890218.effect: 1 Yokai Tuner monster + 1+ "Darkest Forest" non-Tuner monsters(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand or banish 1 card on the field. You can shuffle 3 banished "Darkest Forest" cards back into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Darkest Forest" monster from your hand or up to 2 "Darkest Forest" monsters that are banished, but negate their effects. If this card is sent to GY: You can banish it instead. If this card is banished: You can draw 1 card or add 1 banished "Darkest Forest" monster to your hand. You can only use each effect of "The Wendigo from the Darkest Forest" once per turn.
1890218.name: The Wendigo from the Darkest Forest
1890218.treated_as: The Wendigo from the Darkest Forest

1890216.effect: 1 Yokai Tuner monster + 1 "Darkest Forest" non-Tuner monster(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fiend.)If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Darkest Forest" monster from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot add cards from the Deck to the hand for the rest of this turn, except "Darkest Forest" monsters (max.2). You can shuffle up to 2 "Darkest Forest" banished monsters into the deck, then target cards up to the number of cards shuffled back into the Deck by this effect; send them to GY. If this card is sent to GY: You can banish it instead. If this card is banished you can add to your hand 1 "Darkest Forest" Tuner monster that is banished or in your GY. You can only use each effect of "The Zebra from the Darkest Forest" once per turn.
1890216.name: The Zebra from the Darkest Forest
1890216.treated_as: The Zebra from the Darkest Forest

1897237.effect: For this cards Tribute Summon you can Tribute any number of monsters. If this card is Tribute Summoned: You can target cards on the field and/or in the GY up to the number of monsters Tributed for this cards Summon; return them to the hand. This card's ATK/DEF becomes the combined original ATK/DEF of the monsters Tributed for its Summon. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Garzett" card from your GY to your hand, except "Cosmic Maju Garzett", or place 1 "Garzett" Link Monster from your GY in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. You can only use this effect of "Cosmic Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897237.name: Cosmic Maju Garzett

1897241.effect: This card cannot attack. This effect cannot be negated. If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, add 1 Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except DARK Fiend monsters. If this card is Tributed for the Tribute Summon or Special Summon of a "Garzett" monster: You can place 1 Maju Counters on all "Garzett" Contiuous Spell you control or place 1 LINK 1 "Garzett" monster from your Extra Deck in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. You can only use each effect of "Garzett Acolyte" once per turn.
1897241.name: Garzett Acolyte

1897240.effect: This card cannot attack. This effect cannot be negated. During your Main Phase: You can activate this effect; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except DARK Fiend monsters, also, add 1 Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, you can Tribute Summon 1 "Garzett" monster during your Main Phase this turn, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.). If this card is Tributed for the Tribute Summon or Special Summon of a "Garzett" monster: You can place 2 Maju Counters on all "Garzett" Continuous Spell you control or place 1 LINK 2 "Garzett" monster from your Extra Deck in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. You can only use each effect of "Garzett Soothsayer" once per turn.
1897240.name: Garzett Soothsayer

1897231.effect: For this cards Tribute Summon you can Tribute any number of monsters. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can banish 2 cards from your GY face-down; negate the activation. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the Duel you activate this effect, except "Garzett" Link Monsters. You can use this effect a number of times per turn up to half the number of monsters Tributed for this cards Summon. This card's ATK/DEF becomes the combined original ATK/DEF of the monsters Tributed for its Summon. If this card is sent to the GY: You can shuffle up to 3 "Garzett" cards with different names from your GY into your Deck; place 1 "Garzett" Link Monster from your Extra Deck in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell with a Link Rating equal to the number of cards shuffled. You can only use this effect of "Nightmare Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897231.name: Nightmare Maju Garzett

1897228.effect:
Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: You can place 1 Maju Counter on each Contiuous Spell you control for every "Garzett" Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone that is treated as a face-up Continuous Spell. When a Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster is Tribute Summoned or destroys a monster by batlle: You can have that monster gain the appropriate effects until the end of the next turn based on the number of "Garzett" Link Monster Cards in your Spell & Trap Zone that point to it.
● 1+: Gains 1000 ATK/DEF.
● 2+: Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects if this card battles.
● 3: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card, then, target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
1897228.name: Maju Garzett Dreamscape

1897251.effect:
2 Effect monsters, including a Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster 
For this card's Link Summon, you can also use 1 "Garzett" Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone as material. If this card is Special Summoned: Place it in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, this card gains the original effects of LINK-1 "Garzett" Monster Cards that are treated as Continuous Spells that are not in your adjacent Spell & Trap Zones. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase while this card is treated as a Continuous Spell: You can place 1 Maju Counter on this card for each monster it points to. You can only Special Summon "Captain Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897251.name: Captain Maju Garzett

1897254.effect: 2 Effect monsters, including a Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster / For this card's Link Summon, you can also use 1 "Garzett" Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone as material. If this card is Special Summoned: Place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, this card gains the original effects of LINK-1 "Garzett" Monster Cards that are treated as Continuous Spells in your adjacent Spell & Trap Zones. Once per turn, during the End Phase while this card is treated as a Continuous Spell: You can place 1 Maju Counter on this card for each monster it points to. If this card is sent from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can add 1 "Garzett" card from your GY to your hand, except "Duke Maju Garzett", or place 1 non-LINK-2 "Garzett" Link Monster from your GY in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. You can only Special Summon "Duke Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897254.name: Duke Maju Garzett

1897260.effect:
1 Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster
If this card is Link Summoned: Place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell and if you do, place Maju Counters on this card equal to the Level of the monster used as material. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, if it would be destroyed by card effect, you can remove 2 Maju Counters from this card instead. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, a monster in a Main Monster Zone this card points to gains 500 ATK for each Maju Counter on this card. If this card is Sent from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can add 1 "Garzett" card from your GY to your hand. You can only Special Summon "Enraged Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897260.name: Enraged Maju Garzett

1897247.effect:
2+ Effect monsters, including a Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster 
For this card's Link Summon, you can also use 1 "Garzett" Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone as material. You cannot Summon/Set monsters to a zone this card in your Main Monster Zone points to. (Quick Effect): You can place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, this card gains the original effects of LINK-2 "Garzett" Monster Cards you control that are treated as Continuous Spells. If this card is sent from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can add 1 "Garzett" monster from your Deck to your hand,. You can only Special Summon "Maju Garzett - True Horror" once per turn.
1897247.name: Maju Garzett - True Horror

1897256.effect:
1 Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster 
If this card is Link Summoned: Place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell and if you do, place Maju Counters on this card equal to the Level of the monster used as material. If a monster(s) in a Main Mobster Zone(s) that a "Garzett" Link Monster Card that is treated as a Continuous Spell points to, would be destroyed by card effect, you can remove 2 Maju Counters from this card instead. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, a monster in a Main Monster Zone this card points to gains 500 DEF for each Maju Counter on this card. If this card is Sent from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can add 1 "Garzett" card from your GY to your hand. You can only Special Summon "Passive Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897256.name: Passive Maju Garzett

917544.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your deck or GY to your hand. You can send 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your hand or field to the GY; Add 1 "Flamiller" Ritual monster from your deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Flamiller Breeder" once per turn.
917544.name: Flamiller Breeder

915339.effect: If there are least 5 cards in your Opponent's GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; Equip 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your deck to that Monster.
915339.name: Flamiller Piper

915343.effect: If there are least 3 cards in your Opponent's GY while you control a "Flamiller" Monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If a Ritual monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or by card effect and sent to the GY: You can discard this card; Special Summon 1 of those Monsters.
915343.name: Flamiller Whisperer

915344.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Flamiller Serpent". Negate the effects of all face-up monsters your opponent controls whose ATK is less than or equal to the number of cards in your opponent's GY x 100. Each time your opponent activates a card or effect, send the top card of your opponent's deck to the GY immediately after it resolves.
915344.name: Flamiller Fangking

915345.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Flamiller Serpent". If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can add 1 "Flamiller" Spell/Trap card from your deck to your hand. During your end phase: Inflict 100 damage to your Opponent for each card in your Opponent's GY. You can only use each effect of "Flamiller Snakqueen" once per turn.
915345.name: Flamiller Snakqueen

915353.effect: The equipped monster loses 600 ATK. You can send this face-up card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Flamiller" Ritual monster from your hand. (This is treated as a Ritual Summon). If this face-up card is sent from the field to the GY: send the top 3 cards of your Opponent's deck to the GY.
915353.name: Flamiller Serpent

963738.effect: This card is treated as "Flamiller Serpent" while on the field or in the GY. Activate this card by targeting 1 monster on the field; Equip this card to that monster. A monster equipped with this card loses 100 ATK for each card in your Opponent's GY, also negate the equipped monster's effects while it's ATK is 0. You can send this card equipped to a monster to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Flamiller" Ritual monster from your hand. (This is treated as a Ritual Summon.)
963738.name: Flamiller Pyrviper

915358.effect: Once per turn, you can pay 500 LP to target 1 monster on the field; Equip 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your hand or GY to the targeted monster. You can send 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your hand or field to the GY; Add 1 "Flamiller" monster from your deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Flamiller Snake Toss" once per turn.
915358.name: Flamiller Snake Toss

1218064.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Flamiller Serpent". Negate the effects of all face-up monsters your opponent controls whose ATK is less than or equal to the number of cards in your opponent's GY x 100. Each time your opponent activates a card or effect, send the top card of your opponent's deck to the GY immediately after it resolves.
1218064.name: Flamiller Fangking

1225251.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Flamiller Serpent". If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can add 1 "Flamiller" Spell/Trap card from your deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Flamiller Snakqueen" once per turn.
1225251.name: Flamiller Snakqueen

1225260.effect: 2 level 4 "Flamiller" MonstersOnce per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your Deck or GY to that target. During each end phase: Destroy all face-up monsters on the field equipped with "Flamiller Serpent".
1225260.name: Flamiller Scaleater

916821.effect: 2 level 4 "Flamiller" MonstersOnce per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your Deck or GY to that target. During each end phase: Destroy all face-up monsters on the field equipped with "Flamiller Serpent".
916821.name: Flamiller Scaleater

1902373.effect: You can discard 1 "Latria" monster; Special Summon this card from your hand. If "Towers of Latria" is in a Field Zone: You can Special Summon this card from the GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Artful Latrian" once per turn.
1902373.name: Artful Latrian

1893188.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Latria" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can banish this card from your GY, target 1 "Latria" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 "Latrian Necromancer" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1893188.name: Latrian Dregling

1904586.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Latria" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Latrian Gargoyles". If this card is sent to the GY, while "Towers of Latria" is in a Field Zone: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; half its ATK. You can only use each effect of "Latrian Gargoyles" once per turn.
1904586.name: Latrian Gargoyles

1893238.effect: All "latria" monsters you control gain 300 ATK and DEF. When your opponent activates a monster effect, while you control a "Latria" monster (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; negate the activation, and if you do, Special Summon this card from the GY. You can only use this effect of "Latrian Jailer" once per turn.
1893238.name: Latrian Jailer

1903222.effect: If "Towers of Latria" is in a Field Zone: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you, Special Summon 1 "Latrian Meaneater" from your Deck in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Latrian Meaneater" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Latria" monsters.
1903222.name: Latrian Meaneater

1893171.effect: You can discard this card; add 1 "Towers of Latria" from your Deck to your hand. If a "Latria"monster is Normal Summoned, while this card is in the GY: You can Special Summon this card from the GY. You can only use each effect of "Lost Latrian Royalty" once per turn.
1893171.name: Lost Latrian Royalty

1893261.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Latria" monster from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, target 1 "Latria" monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Queen, Hope of Latria" once per turn.
1893261.name: Queen, Hope of Latria

1902259.effect: If a "Latria" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by a card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can discard this card, target 1 level 4 "Latria" monster in your GY, except "Yurt, Chief of Latria"; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Yurt, Chief of Latria" once per turn.
1902259.name: Yurt, Chief of Latria

1893176.effect: If a "Latria" monster is Special Summoned: Draw 1 card. When a "Latria" monster is targeted for an attack: You can pay 1000 LP; negate the attack, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Latria" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Towers of Latria" once per turn.
1893176.name: Towers of Latria

1896164.effect: Add 1 "Latria" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Latria Witness". During the End Phase, if a "Latria" monster battled this turn: You can discard 1 card; add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Latria Witness" once per duel. You can only activate 1 "Latria Witness" per turn.
1896164.name: Latria Witness

1904455.effect: 2 "Latria" monstersYour opponent cannot target monsters this card points to with card effects. If a monster is Special Summoned to a zone this card points to: You can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use this effect of "Heart of Latria" once per turn.
1904455.name: Heart of Latria

1893161.effect: 2 level 4 "Latria" monstersNeither player can target or destroy "Towers of Latria" with card effects. If the only monsters you control are "Latria" monsters, neither player can Summon level 7 or higher monsters. Once per opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, target 1 "Latria" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, its name becomes "Fool's Idol, Latrian False Hope", but its effects are negated.
1893161.name: Fool's Idol, Latrian False Hope

1904626.effect: 3 level 4 "Latria" monstersCannot be destroyed by card effects. You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it, and if you do, is original ATK and DEF becomes 3300, but its effects are negated. You can only use this effect of "Ancient Latrian Monk" once per turn.
1904626.name: Ancient Latrian Monk
